member.name: WS_METADATA_STATE
member.summary: The state of the metadata object.

member.name: WS_METADATA_STATE.WS_METADATA_STATE_CREATED
member.summary: The initial state of the metadata object.

member.name: WS_METADATA_STATE.WS_METADATA_STATE_RESOLVED
member.summary: All references between metadata documents have been resolved and no more metadata documents may be added to the metadata object. See for more information.

member.name: WS_METADATA_STATE.WS_METADATA_STATE_FAULTED
member.summary: The metadata object not usable due to a previous error. See See and for more information.
